mapper.select: select b.RECV_EMP,e.EMP_NAME RECV_EMP_NAME,b.RECEIPT_NO,b.RECEIPT_DATE,b.ORDER_NO,b.PAYMENT_TYPE,b.STATUS,b.AMT, b.VIP_CUST_NO,cust.VIP_NAME VIP_CUST_NAME,b.START_TIME,b.END_TIME,b.REMARK,b.PAYMENT_YEAR_MONTH,b.CREATE_AT, b.CREATE_BY,b.CREATE_BY_TXT,b.LAST_MODIFIED,b.LAST_MODIFIED_BY,b.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,b.CUST_ACC_AMT,b.ACC_AMT,b.SUPP_AMT, b.DISCOUNT_AMT FROM t_mst_recv_bill b LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info cust on b.VIP_CUST_NO = cust.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on b.RECV_EMP = e.EMP_NO WHERE 1=1 and HAD_OFFSET = 'N' and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_mst_recv_bill
RECEIPT_NO,
HAD_OFFSET,
HAD_OFFSET_NO,
RECEIPT_DATE,
ORDER_NO,
END_TIME,
AMT,
SUPP_AMT,
ACC_AMT,
CUST_ACC_AMT,
DISCOUNT_AMT,
RECV_EMP,
PAYMENT_TYPE,
VIP_CUST_NO,
PAYMENT_YEAR_MONTH,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
STATUS,
REMARK,
#{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hadOffset,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hadOffsetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{receiptDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{suppAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{accAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{custAccAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{discountAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{recvEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paymentYearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_mst_recv_bill
RECEIPT_DATE = #{receiptDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECV_EMP = #{recvEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAD_OFFSET = #{hadOffset,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAD_OFFSET_NO = #{hadOffsetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIP_CUST_NO = #{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_YEAR_MONTH = #{paymentYearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.RECV_EMP,e.EMP_NAME RECV_EMP_NAME,b.RECEIPT_NO,b.RECEIPT_DATE,b.ORDER_NO,b.PAYMENT_TYPE,b.STATUS,b.AMT, b.VIP_CUST_NO,cust.VIP_NAME VIP_CUST_NAME,b.START_TIME,b.END_TIME,b.REMARK,b.PAYMENT_YEAR_MONTH,b.CREATE_AT, b.CREATE_BY,b.CREATE_BY_TXT,b.LAST_MODIFIED,b.LAST_MODIFIED_BY,b.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,b.CUST_ACC_AMT,b.ACC_AMT,b.HAD_OFFSET FROM t_mst_recv_bill b LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info cust on b.VIP_CUST_NO = cust.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on b.RECV_EMP = e.EMP_NO WHERE 1=1 and RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_mst_recv_offset
OFFSET_NO,
OFFSET_DATE,
RECEIPT_NO,
ORDER_NO,
AMT,
ACC_AMT,
VIP_CUST_NO,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
#{offsetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{offsetDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{receiptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{accAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into t_mst_refund
REFUND_NO,
AMT,
REMARK,
VIP_CUST_NO,
VIP_NAME,
BRANCH_NO,
DEALER_NO,
SALES_ORG,
CREATE_AT,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_BY_TXT,
#{refundNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT o.ORDER_NO,o.BRANCH_NO,b.BRANCH_NAME,o.EMP_NO,e.TEL EMP_TEL,e.EMP_NAME,c.VIP_NAME, c.MP CUST_TEL,b.TEL BRANCH_TEL,o.INIT_AMT, bill.SUPP_AMT ORDER_AMT, bill.CUST_ACC_AMT, (SELECT MIN(START_DISP_DATE) FROM t_mst_plan_order_item WHERE ORDER_NO=o.ORDER_NO) START_DATE,o.END_DATE, (SELECT item.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item item WHERE item.TYPE_CODE = and item.ITEM_CODE= o.SALES_ORG) SALES_ORG_NAME,
concat( ( SELECT i.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item i WHERE i.TYPE_CODE= and i.ITEM_CODE = b.PROVINCE ),b.CITY,IFNULL(b.COUNTY,''),b.ADDRESS ) BRANCH_ADDRESS,
concat( (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.PROVINCE), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.CITY), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.COUNTY), IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS,
concat( IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT
,i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT,i.DISP_TOTAL QTY,i.SALES_PRICE BASE_PRICE,(i.DISP_TOTAL * i.SALES_PRICE) TOTAL_PRICE from t_preorder o LEFT JOIN t_mst_recv_bill bill on o.ORDER_NO = bill.ORDER_NO and bill.HAD_OFFSET = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_md_address a on o.ADRESS_NO = a.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c on c.VIP_CUST_NO = o.MILKMEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_acct acct on o.MILKMEMBER_NO =acct.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item i on o.ORDER_NO = i.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR and b.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG WHERE 1=1 and b.SALES_ORG = o.SALES_ORG and LOCATE(o.ORDER_NO,${order})>0 GROUP BY o.ORDER_NO,i.MATNR ORDER BY c.SUBDIST,c.ADDRESS_TXT,CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT

SELECT o.ORDER_NO,o.BRANCH_NO,b.BRANCH_NAME,o.EMP_NO,e.MP EMP_TEL,e.EMP_NAME,c.VIP_NAME, c.MP CUST_TEL,b.TEL BRANCH_TEL,o.INIT_AMT, bill.SUPP_AMT ORDER_AMT, bill.CUST_ACC_AMT, o.END_DATE, (SELECT MIN(DISP_DATE) FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item WHERE ORDER_NO=o.ORDER_NO) START_DATE, (SELECT item.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item item WHERE item.TYPE_CODE = and item.ITEM_CODE= o.SALES_ORG) SALES_ORG_NAME,
concat( ( SELECT i.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item i WHERE i.TYPE_CODE= and i.ITEM_CODE = b.PROVINCE ),b.CITY,IFNULL(b.COUNTY,''),b.ADDRESS ) BRANCH_ADDRESS,
concat( (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.PROVINCE), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.CITY), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = a.COUNTY), IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS,
concat( IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = a.RESIDENTIAL_AREA),''), IFNULL(a.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT ,i.ORDER_NO,i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,i.PRICE BASE_PRICE,sum(i.AMT) TOTAL_PRICE from t_preorder o
LEFT JOIN t_mst_recv_bill bill on o.ORDER_NO = bill.ORDER_NO and bill.HAD_OFFSET = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_md_address a on o.ADRESS_NO = a.ADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c on c.VIP_CUST_NO = o.MILKMEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_acct acct on o.MILKMEMBER_NO =acct.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR and b.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG WHERE 1=1 and o.MILKBOX_STAT !="20" and b.SALES_ORG = o.SALES_ORG and i.STATUS !='30' and LOCATE(o.ORDER_NO,${order})>0 GROUP BY o.ORDER_NO,i.MATNR ORDER BY c.SUBDIST,c.ADDRESS_TXT,CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT

SELECT o.ORDER_NO,o.BRANCH_NO,b.BRANCH_NAME,o.EMP_NO,e.MP EMP_TEL,e.EMP_NAME,c.VIP_NAME, c.MP CUST_TEL,b.TEL BRANCH_TEL,o.INIT_AMT, ( CASE WHEN bill.CUST_ACC_AMT >=0 and o.INIT_AMT - bill.CUST_ACC_AMT >0 THEN o.INIT_AMT-bill.CUST_ACC_AMT ELSE 0 END ) ORDER_AMT, bill.CUST_ACC_AMT, o.END_DATE,MIN(i.DISP_DATE) START_DATE, (SELECT item.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item item WHERE item.TYPE_CODE = and item.ITEM_CODE= o.SALES_ORG) SALES_ORG_NAME,
concat( ( SELECT i.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item i WHERE i.TYPE_CODE= and i.ITEM_CODE = b.PROVINCE ),b.CITY,IFNULL(b.COUNTY,''),b.ADDRESS ) BRANCH_ADDRESS,
concat( (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.PROVINCE), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.CITY), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.COUNTY), IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL(c.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS,
concat( IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL(c.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT ,i.ORDER_NO,i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT,SUM(i.QTY) QTY,i.PRICE BASE_PRICE,sum(i.AMT) TOTAL_PRICE from t_preorder o LEFT JOIN t_mst_recv_bill bill on o.ORDER_NO = bill.ORDER_NO and bill.HAD_OFFSET = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c on c.VIP_CUST_NO = o.MILKMEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_acct acct on o.MILKMEMBER_NO =acct.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i on i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR and b.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG WHERE 1=1 and b.SALES_ORG = o.SALES_ORG and o.ORDER_NO = #{o.ORDER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT o.ORDER_NO,o.BRANCH_NO,b.BRANCH_NAME,o.EMP_NO,e.TEL EMP_TEL,e.EMP_NAME,c.VIP_NAME, c.MP CUST_TEL,b.TEL BRANCH_TEL,o.INIT_AMT, ( CASE WHEN bill.CUST_ACC_AMT >=0 and o.INIT_AMT - bill.CUST_ACC_AMT >0 THEN o.INIT_AMT-bill.CUST_ACC_AMT ELSE 0 END )ORDER_AMT, bill.CUST_ACC_AMT, MIN(i.START_DISP_DATE) START_DATE,o.END_DATE, (SELECT item.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item item WHERE item.TYPE_CODE = and item.ITEM_CODE= o.SALES_ORG) SALES_ORG_NAME,
concat( ( SELECT i.ITEM_NAME from t_sys_code_item i WHERE i.TYPE_CODE= and i.ITEM_CODE = b.PROVINCE ),b.CITY,IFNULL(b.COUNTY,''),b.ADDRESS ) BRANCH_ADDRESS,
concat( (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.PROVINCE), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.CITY), (SELECT it.ITEM_NAME FROM t_sys_code_item it WHERE it.TYPE_CODE = AND it.ITEM_CODE = c.COUNTY), IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL(c.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS,
concat( IFNULL( (SELECT ra.ADDRESS_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL((SELECT ra.RESIDENTIAL_AREA_TXT from t_md_residential_area ra WHERE ra.ID = c.SUBDIST),''), IFNULL(c.ADDRESS_TXT,'') )CUST_ADDRESS_SHORT
,i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.UNIT,i.DISP_TOTAL QTY,i.SALES_PRICE BASE_PRICE,(i.DISP_TOTAL * i.SALES_PRICE) TOTAL_PRICE from t_preorder o LEFT JOIN t_mst_recv_bill bill on o.ORDER_NO = bill.ORDER_NO and bill.HAD_OFFSET = 'N' LEFT JOIN t_md_branch b on o.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_branch_emp e on o.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_cust_info c on c.VIP_CUST_NO = o.MILKMEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN t_vip_acct acct on o.MILKMEMBER_NO =acct.VIP_CUST_NO LEFT JOIN t_mst_plan_order_item i on o.ORDER_NO = i.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex on i.MATNR = ex.MATNR and b.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG WHERE 1=1 and b.SALES_ORG = o.SALES_ORG and o.ORDER_NO = #{o.ORDER_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
